import React, { useState } from 'react' import useAnimationFrames from '../../hooks/useAnimationFrames' import bananaIcon from './../../imgs/carbs/banana.svg' import cherryIcon from './../../imgs/carbs/cherry.svg' import Frame1 from './Frame1' import Narrator from './Narrator' import './styles.scss' function Introduction() { const [animationFrameIdx, setAnimationFrameIdx] = useState(0) const [displayNarrator, setDisplayNarrator] = useState(true) return (

Bem-vindo ao jogo

{useAnimationFrames()}
{displayNarrator && }
) } export default Introduction
